snippet.title: Office Fight Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
👻 Welcome to Office Fight - The Ultimate Workplace Mayhem Game! 👻

Get ready to embark on a hilariously chaotic journey as a vengeful ghost armed with the power to haunt ordinary office equipment. In Office Fight your mission is simple: create mayhem, cause havoc, and start epic ragdoll brawls between co-workers, all in the name of revenge!

🎮 Key Features 🎮

Ghostly Shenanigans: Possess office equipment and unleash your ghostly powers to create hilarious chaos.
Ragdoll Brawls: Watch as co-workers engage in over-the-top, physics-driven brawls that will leave you in stitches.
Puzzle Madness: Solve quirky puzzles to set up the perfect office battleground and let the hilarity ensue.
Customize Your Play Style: Unlock new abilities as you progress, and create chaos in new and exciting ways!

------------------------------------------

Wishlist on Steam now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2747060/Office_Fight

------------------------------------------

📲  LINKS  📲

➫ Website: https://www.office-fight.com 
➫ TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@officefight 
➫ Twitter: https://twitter.com/OfficeFightGame  
➫ Discord: https://discord.com/invite/MZHW8McbWq 
➫ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/office_fight   
➫ YouTube:  https://www.youtube.com/@OfficeFightGame 

Stay tuned for the official release date by subscribing to our channel.

Join us on this ghostly adventure and get ready to wreak physics-based havoc in the most unconventional office you've ever seen! 😂👻🕹️ #OfficeFightGame #Gaming #ComingSoon
